sub_title: Cost Engineering Consultant at HV Consultancy "Cost Engineering"
summary:
A very experienced senior Cost Control / Estimating Engineer specialized in all area’s of the Cost Engineering Fuctions

He has more then 30 years experience within Shell Companies (Petrochemicals and Exploration / Production) in different Cost Engineering Functions and from 2002 up till now as an Independent Cost Engineering Consultant.

Have worked on wide range of major capital investm. from development to creating asset breakdowns for complete facilities (cradle to grave) around the world as Netherlands - France - Qatar - Singapore and other countries as Consultant , where he has been responsible for the estimating and cost control functions up to the cost control / finance manager in project teams.

Specialties: See experience part.
